Articles.Content:
So during the 'Great derp' i tried to make as realistic mun'ar lander as possible, so I came with this design, everything is stock except i use custom rocketry pack (fairings only' cause i think everything else is OP to KSP scale). I placed those fuel tanks on a slope to have lower drag but the engines points straight down on small cubes. The gap in the middle is a cluster of engines for mid stage and last transfer stage is in-between fairings with lander on top
